title: requesTUI
description: A pseudo-postman-like TUI written in Go for API testing and sending http requests directly from your terminal
content:
Used tview to create a TUI using golang.
Implemented http requests using the net/http requests in go

title: pdfsearch-cli
description: A command-line tool to search for a specific string in PDF files in a given directory and its subdirectories.
content:
Implemented parsing of text from pdf files in golang.
Used go-routines to search the name of the pdf file

title: MarkIt
description: MarkIt is a realtime markdown editor built using NodeJS, SocketIO and ShowdownJS
content:
Used socketIO to relay data and send back output to and from server in real time.
Implemented text to markdown parsing using showdownJS.

title: stock-scraping-API
description: A stock scraping service that scrapes data from yahoo finance and serves it on a REST API endpoint using fastAPI.
content:
Used bs4 to parse and scrape stock webpage.
Used fastAPI to get requested stock parameter, call the scraping service and serve it on the given endpoint.

title: app-blocker
description: A desktop app to remove distractions, built using electronJS.
content: Set up main functionality for blocking selected installed applications and websites. Implemented a dashboard route and a logs route in the project for additional information.

title: VTOP-download-manager
description: A python program for dealing with the unreadable names given to reference material on my college portal's download page.
content: The program sorts all the material downloaded from course page into each subject in each semester and sorts it according to the date given on VTOP.

title: react-meals-app
description: A website built using react to view different meals, their recipes and save them!
content: Implemented useState, useEffect, useContext hooks in react to create a simple webapp

title: user-login-api
description: A simple authentication API with login and signup routes.
content: Used JWT to implement an authentication API along with password hashing and persistance using mongoDB

title: discord-admin-bot
description: A discord bot with adminstrative functionalities written in NodeJS.
content: Used the discord API to create a discord bot with simple admin privileges.
